ReviewList.Text: This was a well-written story with engaging characters and an interesting plot. It reminds me of "Sex and the City," one of my favorite shows. I love the curvy-girl character, Ella, and her sex scene with the cop was HOT! I can't wait to read the rest of this series.

I absolutely loved this encounter! Monique is definitely at the top of the list when it comes to great stories. This is one of my favorite authors! She knows how to draw you in and keep you engaged in the story for days even when you have finished reading the story. Can't wait for the next book!

This is a fast paced series about 7 friends together since school now grown women with big careers in the big apple.  The bet, who can have the most "quickies" in a month.  Ella has her dream bakery and wants to make it even bigger and better, this bet is just the way to fuel this goal.  When a gorgeous police officer knocks on her bakery door after hours she may just have found the way to start this bet with a bang!  I can't wait to see what happens with the rest of the girls and who will win this crazy bet.
Awesome read. I wouldn't expect any less from Monique.

This is just unbelievable how fast you are drawn into the story.  And the hot love scene with Ella and the stud cop is just Wow.  You are there, exchanging places with her.  Can't wait to read the next Encounter. And the next. And the next.  Bring it on Monique.

This is a wonderfully sweet and HOT story! So well written that the story really flows and Monique is such an awesome story teller. I'm all for Ella and the bakery of cupcakes and I haven't even met the rest of the books yet!

I usually don't read short stories or serials, but after reading the blurb I knew I had to read this story. I am so glad I did. It was quick, yet very detailed from beginning to end. The characters in this story will probably have you comparing them to quite a few of your friends. It was sweet and steamy, and it had me laughing out loud. Even though it's short and a serial it did not feel rushed because the friends spend plenty of time together and the couple really get to enjoy their one-night stand, so there was no chance of having to wonder what else happened at the end. I can't wait to see what will happen next!

This story was an enjoyable read. The characters are fun, chick-lit type characters, and the premise is unique. I loved the interaction between the friends and the way they joke with each other. The steamy scene between Ella and the police officer was great. WOW! Sizzling hot. It looks like I've found a great new erotic romance series to feed my addiction. I can't wait to see which girl wins the bet on who can have the most one-night stands in a month. My money is on Brooke. ;)

I got this book as a recommendation from Amazon. How many adult women would just love to do this? Men have done this all the time with their friends! This is the first from a series regarding seven friends placing a bet; how many sexual encounters can each one have in one month? Whoever had the highest, gets the pot of money. Oh! The pit is worth $10,000!! Granted there are rules, but c'mon you gotta love the concept! I can wait to read the rest of this series!

This quick read was totally hot. I love the sexy cop encounter and can't wait to read the rest of the series. Monique Dubois is such an amazing author. This story is just as well written as her full length books. I can't wait to see who wins the bet between these friends. Maybe they all will win in one way or another. Definitely would recommend to anyone wanting a hot, sexy, quick read.

I like how Monique set the stage for these women.  The storyline is witty and sexy.  The characters are smart, well established within their careers, and sexy.  A nice diversity of women have come together for one big payout!  I wonder who will win the money?  Who will get their heart broken and who will find true love.  I guess you will have to read the stories.  I am hooked!

Enjoyed the interaction between the characters, of long time friendships that we all wish we had and very few of us really find.  The friendly competition will be fun to watch unfold and see how each of the characters go through each of their encounters.  I definitely will be "watching" ;)
Love this book. Another hit from Monique DuBois!!!! This is going go be a great steamy set of quick reads. Can't wait for the rest. Thanks for another delightful book!!!!!
a adult read for adults who are in to the series recommend highly can't wait for the next one of the series a very good read but quick shaping up to be a good series
